Name: Name Change, Judge Charles J. Beckinella Place, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a street name, Judge Charles J. Beckinella Place, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits
Judge Charles J. 		           President Street		between Smith Street and
Beckinella Place							Hoyt Street
      
      	
______________________________________________________________________________		
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
